mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (SEQ, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENT) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0) + 1 FROM BOARD), #{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content} WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.select:
(SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE T_NOTI = 'Y')
UNION ALL
(SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE T_NOTI = 'N')
ORDER BY T_NOTI = 'N',T_NOTI = 'Y'
